0.9.12.name: wordpress/zingiri-web-shop
0.9.12.description:
Zingiri Web Shop is a Wordpress plugin that turns a great content management system into a fantastic e-commerce solution.

Main features * Simple installation & easy configuration * Sell digital and physical products * Full customer management module * Complete ordering and stock management module * Ajax powered shopping cart & one page checkout * Support for payment portals like Paypal, Worldpay and Google Checkout * Multiple language libraries included: English, Dutch, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Danish, Estonian, Finish, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Slovak, Thai, Turkish and Serbian * Localized tax support: including support for complex cascading tax systems * Easily migrate your current web shop by uploading your products via an XML file

Extend Web Shop with a number of additional professional plugins * Social media: integrate your shop with Facebook and star

Main features * Simple installation & easy configuration * Sell digital and physical products * Full customer management module * Complete ordering and stock management module * Ajax powered shopping cart & one page checkout * Support for payment portals like Paypal, Worldpay and Google Checkout * Multiple language libraries included: English, Dutch, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Danish, Estonian, Finish, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Slovak, Thai, Turkish and Serbian * Localized tax support: including support for complex cascading tax systems * Easily migrate your current web shop by uploading your products via an XML file

Extend Web Shop with a number of additional professional plugins * Social media: integrate your shop with Facebook and star
